pullRequest.title: Use correct system property name in PooledByteBufAllocator (io.netty.…
pullRequest.bodyText:
…allocator.cacheTrimIntervalMillis)
Motivation:
We had a typo in the system property name that was used to lookup the cache trime interval. We should ensure we use the correct naming when lookup the property
Modifications:

Support the old and the new (correct) naming of the property when configure the cache trim interval.
Log something if someone uses the old (deprecated) name

Result:
Fixes #9981

nodes.bodyText: In case where both are specified (I know unlikely) would it be better to warn but use the new one?

commit.message:
Use correct system property name in PooledByteBufAllocator (io.netty.allocator.cacheTrimIntervalMillis)

Motivation:

We had a typo in the system property name that was used to lookup the cache trime interval. We should ensure we use the correct naming when lookup the property

Modifications:

- Support the old and the new (correct) naming of the property when configure the cache trim interval.
- Log something if someone uses the old (deprecated) name

Result:

Fixes https://github.com/netty/netty/issues/9981
